oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Apollo 16 - Moon travel tapes - Tape 1 Side 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 1 (Side 1). Program sent on the Apollo 16 space mission for Charlie Duke's (astronaut) enjoyment. Originally from a cassette Tape. Featuring Bill Bailey (host), Porter Wagoner, Dolly Parton, Wagon Masters, and Speck Rhodes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bill Bailey; Porter Wagoner; Dolly Parton; Wagonmasters; Speck Rhodes
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening announcer ([Unknown]) introduces Bill Bailey -- (00:07) Bill Bailey opening remarks addressing the Apollo 16 crew and introduces the Porter Wagoner Show -- (00:51) Companies Comin' (Porter Wagoner) -- (02:09) Porter Wagoner addresses Apollo 16 crew and introduces Dolly Parton -- (03:15) Joshua (Dolly Parton) -- (05:50) Porter Wagoner and Dolly Parton address Charlie Duke by reading a letter from his wife (Dorothy Meade Claiborne) and additional comments -- (07:18) Stampeding the Orange Blossom Special (Wagonmasters) -- (09:08) Porter Wagoner introduces Speck Rhodes -- (09:45) Speck Rhodes performs comedy with Porter Wagoner -- (11:20) Shindig in The Barn (Speck Rhodes) -- (12:46) Porter Wagoner speaks of inspiration for "The Right Combination" -- (13:48) The Right Combination (Porter Wagoner & Dolly Parton) -- (16:10) Porter Wagoner introduces "Run That By Me One More Time" -- (16:27) Run That By Me One More Time(Porter Wagoner & Dolly Parton) -- (19:05)Porter Wagoner comments on how a pole cat inspired "Wake Up Jacob" -- (19:29) Wake Up Jacob (Porter Wagoner) -- (21:08) Porter Wagoner addresses astronauts upcoming mission -- (21:46) How Great Thou Art (Dolly Parton) -- (24:55) Bill Bailey closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bailey, Bill; Wagoner, Porter; Parton, Dolly; Parton, Dolly, 1946-; Wagonmasters (Musical group); Rhodes, Speck;
